metadata.title: CVE-2021-3542 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2021-42739.Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2021-42739. Notes:All CVE users should reference CVE-2021-42739 instead of this candidate.All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed toprevent accidental usage.

criterions.comment: linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oem: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
